inputs.name: channel
inputs.text: The channel name where notifications will be retrieved from. If not specified, component will listen to the default channel.

methods.name: remove
methods.text: Removes the specified notification without triggering a close animation.

methods.name: clear
methods.text: Closes all notifications in the current subscribed channel.

api.name: NotificationConfig
api.usage: Should by injected, typically in the AppModule, to customize the values of its properties in order to provide alternate default values for the NotificationComponent.

variables.name: sticky
variables.text: Defines if notifications should be manually closed or if they should auto-close after some timeout.

variables.name: timeout
variables.text: The duration delay, in milliseconds, to wait before closing non-sticky notifications.

variables.name: channel
variables.text: The channel name where notifications will be retrieved from. If not specified, component will listen to the default channel.

variables.name: clearAllOnNavigate
variables.text: Defines if all notifications should be cleared upon NavigationEnd event.

variables.name: groupSimilar
variables.text: Defines if similar notifications should grouped.

tokens.name: CLEAR_NOTIFICATIONS_ON_ROUTE_CHANGE
tokens.text: Defines if all notifications should be cleared upon NavigationEnd event.

tokens.name: GROUP_SIMILAR_NOTIFICATIONS
tokens.text: Defines if similar notifications should be grouped.

api.name: NotificationService
api.usage: Should be injected in component's constructor to send notifications to the NotificationComponent

variables.name: events
variables.text: An observable that emits every time a notification is sent or cleared through the service

variables.name: clearAllOnNavigate
variables.text: Defines if all notifications should be cleared upon NavigationEnd event.

methods.name: info
methods.text: Triggers an info notification. It takes either the notification's text or a full notification config object.

methods.name: success
methods.text: Triggers an success notification. It takes either the notification's text or a full notification config object.

methods.name: warning
methods.text: Triggers an warning notification. It takes either the notification's text or a full notification config object.

methods.name: error
methods.text: Triggers an error notification. It takes either the notification's text or a full notification config object.

methods.name: send
methods.text: Triggers a notification whose type is either the one provided as second argument or the one specified in the config. It takes either the notification's text or a full notification config object.

methods.name: clear
methods.text: Clears all notifications displayed in the specified channel.

methods.name: clearAll
methods.text: Clears all notification from all channels.
